name: pf2ools-data

scripts.test: npm run test:fileStructure && npm run test:data
scripts.test:data: echo "TODO: this will simply validate all data against the schema (breaking early)"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:json -- -rc ./data && npm run clean:prettify -- --log-level warn
scripts.index: npm run index:datatypes -- -Compress && npm run index:IDs -- -IgnoreCollisions -Compress && npm run index:shortNames -- -Compress && npm run index:homebrewSources -- -Compress && npm run index:UUIDs -- -Compress
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:bySource -- -Compress && npm run bundle:byDatatype -- -Compress -SkipEmpty
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run index && npm run bundle

author: The Pf2ools project
description: The Pf2ools ecosystem's repository of Pathfinder 2nd Edition game data.
